Package theme

Class ColorTheme

java.lang.Object
theme.ColorTheme
public class ColorTheme extends Object
The ColorTheme class which deals with changing and setting the views color theme between light, dark, and random colors.
Author:
John Fourchy, Akli Amrous, Rhys Davis, Joey Enslen

    void
    setColor​(String color)
    Calls helper functions which change the colors of the borderpane.
    private void
    setDark()
    Sets the podcast players theme to a dark theme by changing background colors to a black and grey color scheme.
    private void
    setLight()
    Sets the podcast players theme to a light theme by changing background colors to a white and off white color scheme.
    private void
    setRandom()
    Sets the podcast players theme to a random theme by changing background colors to a randomly chosen color scheme.

  • Constructor Details

    • ColorTheme

      public ColorTheme​(javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane window)
      Constructor which creates a ColorTheme object. Stores the current theme and borderpane to enable editing the colors of the objects.
      Parameters:
      window - - the borderpane to change the colors in

  • Method Details

    • setColor

      public void setColor​(String color)
      Calls helper functions which change the colors of the borderpane. Takes in the theme to change the colors to and calls the appropriate function.
      Parameters:
      color - - the theme to change the colors to

    • getColor

      public String getColor()
      Returns the current ColorThemes current theme.
      Returns:
      - the objects current theme

    • setDark

      private void setDark()
      Sets the podcast players theme to a dark theme by changing background colors to a black and grey color scheme.

    • setLight

      private void setLight()
      Sets the podcast players theme to a light theme by changing background colors to a white and off white color scheme.

    • setRandom

      private void setRandom()
      Sets the podcast players theme to a random theme by changing background colors to a randomly chosen color scheme.
